title: Unlocking Your Badge
content:
There’s a lot more to your badge’s software than you realise. Try this:
Up Up Down Down Left Right Left Right B A
(Yup the Konami code!)

title: Getting Started
content: Chapter 1 Unlocking and Connecting to your Badge Learn how to access the secret menus and connect to your badge over Bluetooth.

NodeConf EU 2017 Badge Welcome!
We hope you are as excited as we are about your attendee badge this year. We’ve spent the past few months speccing and preparing it for the event.
